name: Fighter!
description:
A two payer fighting game where one player controls with a keyboard and the other with a controller. I am well aware there are no transitions on the grass level i didn't get them to work

Controls

Player one

  • a/d move left and right
  • w or space to jump
  • left-click to shoot

Player two

  • B (switch pro controller) to jump
  • right trigger to shoot
  • left joystick to move
